posts.post_content:
I have the following T-206 HOF's for sale:

Lajoie - Portrait (Piedmont 150) in PSA 3 SOLD

McGraw (w/cap) (Piedmont 350/460) in PSA 3 SOLD
Tinker (bat on shoulder) (Sov. 460) in PSA 2.5 SOLD
Joss - Pitching (Sweet Cap. 350) in PSA 2.5 SOLD
Shipping is $5.00 for any number of cards. Scans can be provided tonight, just provide your e-mail.

Thanks,

Bill
I'll take Tinker if it's available!

Can you send me scans of the Lajoie portrait?

[url]Dean.hackett@surewest.net[/url]

Thanks!

Scans will be sent out tonight to all e-mails that requested any and all cards still available.

Thanks,

Bill

All scans have been sent out to all requested e-mails. If I missed anyone, please let me know and I will send out ASAP.

Bill

Lajaoie and Tinker are sold. McGraw and Joss still available.

All cards now sold, thanks to all buyers.
